ISSUE.TITLE: Duplicated validation messages when registering as new user
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug The user registration is validating the email address of new users in two places, which will cause two validation messages on the summary view: 1. In the `RegisterViewModel` class which is an `IValidatableObject` 2. In the `RegistrationController` with the addition of checking for duplicated email addresses. ### To Reproduce Enable user registration and leave the email field empty.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix UI issue on Security module (#11735)
